website_summaries.verdict: One of the most unique umbrella holders to consider for a more rustic accent to the home decor. Great functionality mixed with a unique look.
pros: The extra wide holder space is large enough to comfortably hold several umbrellas without getting tangled up
Cast iron build is extra tough
cons: Metal construction makes the holder extra heavy

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: It works for me. I like the height and it holds a few large umbrellas and more. The whole item feels very light and delicate so I wish it were more sturdy. The plate it comes with is very heavy and once inside adds weight. The plate is a tight fit.
customer_reviews.author: Joz

customer_reviews.title: Beauty & Function ... WOW!
customer_reviews.text: I've never had an umbrella stand before. I guess I was waiting to buy one that had just about everything going for it. This piece is so beautifully made ... attractive and sturdy. The open slats allow your sopping wet umbrella to air-dry thoroughly. Another fabulous feature is the metal base, which keeps the rain water from soiling your beautiful hardwood floor. I've been using a squatty flower pot to hold my wet umbrellas, but they always flopped over and got in my way. So now, I have this lovely conversation piece which performs an important function at the same time. We should all possess those 2 qualities, RIGHT?
customer_reviews.author: Cookie

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful product, truly functional, made and shipped with pride.
customer_reviews.text: This is a handsome product, the kind that guests comment about. The stand has a small footprint, and like a good doorman, it is unobtrusive, yet holds grandpa's two canes, two umbrellas, and two walking sticks. The cast iron pan on the bottom fits perfectly, its weight supports the umbrellas and such. It's shipping packaging was as precise as the excellent, beautiful construction of the stand itself; the manufacturer takes pride in its product, and that pride show. Children, please do not play with the slats.
customer_reviews.author: Mac

customer_reviews.title: Lovely precision construction
customer_reviews.text: The stand is accurately represented in the ad. The horizontal slats are precisely dovetailed into the side strips, which are pegged together. There are no nails or other fasteners, as far as I can tell. The drip pan is over half the weight, providing good stability. Nice.
customer_reviews.author: Wary buyer

customer_reviews.title: Different color from the picture
customer_reviews.text: I gave 3 star only because the color is different from the picture. I was expecting brown but the item I received is much lighter then the picture shown.
customer_reviews.author: GPM

customer_reviews.title: Really excellent workmanship and has a cast iron insert for the ...
customer_reviews.text: Really excellent workmanship and has a cast iron insert for the bottom for weight/sturdiness and to prevent water damage on the wood. I use this to hold my yoga mats so my cats can't scratch them up. It fits two rolled up yoga mate perfectly so there is just enough room at the base for both plus a little extra.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca M.

customer_reviews.title: I kept it and put it somewhere that it is not easily seen as it does hold the canes and umbrellas ...
customer_reviews.text: Not very impressive piece of work. I kept it and put it somewhere that it is not easily seen as it does hold the canes and umbrellas I wanted it to hold.
customer_reviews.author: Gandalf

customer_reviews.title: Great design
customer_reviews.text: Great design. Use it for canes and reachers. Never tips over. No negatives. Bought a second one for another room it worked so well!
customer_reviews.author: !Texas Sunshine!

customer_reviews.title: Looks great in the office
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking and doesn't tip over - beware however that water will pool inside the weighted tray if really wet umbrellas are placed inside. This isn't a deal-breaker for me.
customer_reviews.author: Parachute Girl

customer_reviews.title: Broken pieces
customer_reviews.text: Mine arrived with 2 wood pieces broke off from the the bottom of the holder. I’m still looking for a glue that can adhere them back on. Design wise the product looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love the style
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was looking for. A bit light wood. But stained it and it’s perfect
customer_reviews.author: Mari

customer_reviews.title: looks great
customer_reviews.text: It's very well made, sturdy, lovely. Holds lots of umbrellas and hiking poles.
customer_reviews.author: Carol G.

customer_reviews.title: Love the all in one place storage container.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this umbrella holder to store all the picker-upper gadgets all in one place. Now I know where they are instead of hunting them down when I need one.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine R.

customer_reviews.title: good product
customer_reviews.text: The item was what I expected. It fits well in the space by my front door. Have used it mostly for walking sticks/ canes. The drip pan catches the melting snow.
customer_reviews.author: MARK SMITH

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Product as specified. Looks great. There is a metal plate at the bottom to protect the wood. I am happy with the product.
customer_reviews.author: David C

customer_reviews.title: The color is not the same as shown in the ...
customer_reviews.text: The color is not the same as shown in the picture. I bought it for the color to combine with the other furniture. The one I get is bamboo color.
customer_reviews.author: Corina Oramas

customer_reviews.title: Great storage solution!
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I go to a lot of renaissance faires in costume. This umbrella stand is perfect for storing our arrows and swords.
customer_reviews.author: Solaria

customer_reviews.title: Entry-way Storage for Umbrellas
customer_reviews.text: Really beautiful addition to our entryway as well as being something that we really needed to store our umbrellas. This product is well-made and very attractive.
customer_reviews.author: GLW

customer_reviews.title: Just right
customer_reviews.text: Just what I expected. It sure neatened up a messy corner.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice looking and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Very nice looking and sturdy, holds a ton of things - even hedge trimmers, and arrived quickly. Just what my entryway needed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ThiSPACE Entry-way stotrage stand
customer_reviews.text: I love it, using it as a cane holder for my collection of canes. Nice size, looks just like the photo.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy M.

customer_reviews.title: perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: perfect fit in spot near door. holds my umbrellas perfectly
customer_reviews.author: Pat Randall

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's very nice, however just worried the wood will weaken and chip once it gets wet. Hopefully not!!!
customer_reviews.author: Cecilia Mauro

customer_reviews.title: This stand is sturdy and tall enough to hold multiple canes
customer_reviews.text: This stand is sturdy and tall enough to hold multiple canes. The iron drip pan gives it enough weight to keep it from tipping. It's handsome and functional and worth the cost. A good value.
customer_reviews.author: Larry O

customer_reviews.title: Umbrella stand
customer_reviews.text: Not a quality piece. It was received damaged and returned.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with it. Pic does not do it justice.
customer_reviews.author: Kay

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Amazing umbrella holder!!! We have kid sized and adult sized umbrellas and it is sturdy and beautiful!
customer_reviews.author: SoCalCyclone

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: A different, well-made item which looks much more expensive than it's price!
customer_reviews.author: Glenys Selina

customer_reviews.title: Good for more than umbrellas
customer_reviews.text: We use this in our basement to hold the kids' cosplay swords and light sabers. It's working really well for that. It has a weighted bottom that keeps it from being knocked over easily and it's wide enough and tall enough to be good for kids' cosplay swords and light sabers. We've got 4-5 foam or plastic swords and 3-4 light saber toys in it right now.
customer_reviews.author: KMW

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Totally love it. It's been raiming everyday since I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Isabel

customer_reviews.title: surprise buy
customer_reviews.text: this is a lot sturdier than I thought and looks good in my house. My spouse took over use if it
customer_reviews.author: Charles Alford

customer_reviews.title: I love the modern look
customer_reviews.text: I'm using this as a yoga mat holder. I love the modern look!
customer_reviews.author: tarafer

customer_reviews.title: Very Useful!
customer_reviews.text: This is well made; and very attractive near front door. I got it for holding umbrellas, but plenty of room for my husband and my canes. It is nothing to put together, as I am very challenged in that way. Very sturdy and attractive next to a rack to hold shoes of same wood material. No more searching for canes, or umbrellas and the open slats make damp umbrellas dry very quickly. I love the metal bottom (no puddles on the floor). One of the best quality and useful purchases I've ever made. This would also make a nice gift for anyone, because I can't imagine a house without one.V
customer_reviews.author: Jeanette Barnett

customer_reviews.title: Good buy 👍
customer_reviews.text: Very nice umbrella stand...color was lighter than pictured, which I really liked. Looks kind of like oak wood, doesn't take up a lot of room, iron base included, tall enough to hold a tall umbrella. No set up required. My only concern is that the wood will eventually damage from the wet umbrellas...hopefully bamboo will hold up.
customer_reviews.author: reviews&comments347

customer_reviews.title: Not as sturdy as it needs to be and returns are not full refunds
customer_reviews.text: The piece is very thin wood and the bottom plate is hard to get in and out. Would like to return but I am not willing to suffer no refund for the shipping costs in addition to a 15% or 25% restocking fee for this item. I will avoid this vendor in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Shopsalot

customer_reviews.title: Works great but tray gets rusty
customer_reviews.text: Have had this in my office for three years now. Great for allowing umbrellas to dry. However, cast iron tray at the bottom has gotten rusty. The weight helps to prevent the stand from toppling, but wish it had been finished to make it rust-resistant.
customer_reviews.author: idigapony

customer_reviews.title: Design favors great airflow and minimal cleaning
customer_reviews.text: Construction is solid, with room to spare for three umbrellas and three canes in an entryway. Design favors great airflow and minimal cleaning: an occasional dusting will keep it looking sharp. It is a stable piece, and has not tipped, save when I caught a cane handle with my bag and pulled everything along with; a simple shift in placement solved that issue. We like the piece very much and look forward to using it for a long while.
customer_reviews.author: M.B

customer_reviews.title: HOLDS UMBRELLAS LIKE A CHAMPION
customer_reviews.text: I use this inside my door for....you guessed it....umbrellas. To really change things up, I also put some canes in there. It is pretty heavy and holds a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa H. Luther

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is loving this stand for our grandson's toy swords and other long toys.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: functional & decorative.
customer_reviews.text: I use it to put decorative lighted twigs in -- very pretty...also good for umbrellas.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Customer

customer_reviews.title: Was delivered broken
customer_reviews.text: The item came in broken. I returned it without a problem but did not reorder as I was concerned about it’s lasting durability.
customer_reviews.author: nyrxman

customer_reviews.title: Good but expensive.
customer_reviews.text: A very pleasant solution to keeping umbrellas and walking sticks handy. But beware! Buying from USA is expensive. Shipping, tax and duty doubled the price of the item. Had I realised I may have had second thoughts.
customer_reviews.author: Minim

customer_reviews.title: Perfect in every way
customer_reviews.text: Perfect in every way. I love the open-work design and the heavy drip pan. Very attractive as well as functional. AND it comes assembled! The photo doesn't show the drip pan.
customer_reviews.author: Felicia

customer_reviews.title: Classic design
customer_reviews.text: I liked this umbrella stand so much, I ordered a second one for my beach house! It's classic lines go with any decor.
customer_reviews.author: S. Steingass

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Now I can find my canes, umbrellas, and grabbers. Looks just like picture
customer_reviews.author: Mary L Farley

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Modern style. Color may be a little lighter than shown.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: We love it. Looks better than pictured and really like ...
customer_reviews.text: We love it. Looks better than pictured and really like the metal plate for collecting drips. Blends perfectly with our Brazilian Cherry floor
customer_reviews.author: starfish

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: looks good in the foyer. we are pleased with the look of this piece. the bamboo (?) wood has a nice cherry-color finish.
customer_reviews.author: david

customer_reviews.title: Great umbrella holder
customer_reviews.text: This is a really nice looking umbrella holder, just what we were looking for. It is tall enough for golf umbrellas and wide enough to hold 8 or 9 umbrellas at least. Very tiny ones would get lost in this basket.
customer_reviews.author: Non-profit consultant

customer_reviews.title: gift
customer_reviews.text: gave to beauty parlor as a gift for christmas to new owner. the old 1 was awful. owner was thrilled - looks great
customer_reviews.author: elaine

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like included weight in stand, I am using for many walking canes I own
customer_reviews.author: bigwilly

customer_reviews.title: Love this umbrella stand
customer_reviews.text: Love this umbrella stand. I wish I saw it at the Container Store first because their price is $39.99!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Efficient umbrella holder.
customer_reviews.text: The article was exactly what I expected. Good looking and convenient for my need. Good price also.
customer_reviews.author: Tony BP

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality product
customer_reviews.text: The holder came broken in the bottom. See attached photo. It stands leaning towards one side. The metal plate inside the holder is too shallow to hold water.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Yu

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Better than I expected. Very handsome and well made and finished,
customer_reviews.author: Loo

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit and design. I keep it with umbrellas just inside my front door.
customer_reviews.author: John N.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my needs
customer_reviews.text: I use this product for my canes and hip kit. It works perfectly. Does not tip and looks nice. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Dana

customer_reviews.title: Substantial and attractive
customer_reviews.text: Good looking, well made, and sturdy. I have 9 full-size & golf umbrellas in mine as well as 5 walking sticks & canes. Very stable, no worry about this tipping over. Love the compact shape - takes up very little floor room. Just be aware that because it's tall, it's not for compact umbrellas.
customer_reviews.author: Agatha

product_meta.title: In This Space Rustic Open Slats Entry-Way Umbrella and Walking Canes Storage 8.5" X 10.4" X 20" H (w/cast Iron drip pan)
product_meta.description: 100% bamboo crafted Open slats design for air ventilation keeps umbrella dry 8.46" X 10.43" X 19.70" H Tall enough for golf umbrella, walking cans, or anything that puts into it. Can be use for outdoor or indoor Includes free cast iron metal dripping pan! ** Due to nature of the bamboo material; color may vary slightly.
feature_bullets: Open slats design for air ventilation keeps umbrella dry
Holds umbrella, walking canes, keep your entryway organized
Modern design, light weight, beautifully designed
Includes sturdy cast iron metal dripping pan!
